name: Chocolate Vanilla Ice Cream Sandwiches with Blueberry Compote Swirl
description: These Vegan Chocolate Vanilla Ice Cream Sandwiches feature a creamy dairy-free vanilla ice cream with a fruity blueberry swirl sandwiched between two delicious chocolate cookie dough layers! No Bake
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup brown sugar ( or coconut sugar)
15 oz can full fat coconut milk
1/2 cup raw cashews  (soaked in hot water for 15 minutes)
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract or vanilla powder

recipeInstructions.text: To make the chocolate cookie dough layer, add the oat flour, almond flour, cocoa, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon in a bowl and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the chocolate cookie dough layer, add the oat flour, almond flour, cocoa, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon in a bowl and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add in the wet ingredients, maple syrup, oil and vanilla extract. Mix well. Use your hands to mix and knead into a mixture that starts to stick with itself.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add in the wet ingredients, maple syrup, oil and vanilla extract. Mix well. Use your hands to mix and knead into a mixture that starts to stick with itself.

recipeInstructions.text: You might need to add a little bit of milk. Just sprinkle in milk a little at a time until the mixture starts to stick to each other. You don't have to form a dough. It just needs to be able to stick when pressed. Mix in 3 tablespoons of chocolate chips and set aside
recipeInstructions.name: You might need to add a little bit of milk. Just sprinkle in milk a little at a time until the mixture starts to stick to each other. You don't have to form a dough. It just needs to be able to stick when pressed. Mix in 3 tablespoons of chocolate chips and set aside

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 9 x 5 loaf pan with parchment paper. Press half of the dough mixture for the bottom layer of the ice cream sandwiches.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a 9 x 5 loaf pan with parchment paper. Press half of the dough mixture for the bottom layer of the ice cream sandwiches.

recipeInstructions.text: For the ice cream, drain the cashews and add them to the blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend until the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: For the ice cream, drain the cashews and add them to the blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend until the mixture is smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: You might have to blend it 3 or 4 times. I usually blend mine for a minute. Let it sit for 3 or 4 minutes then blend again until the mixture is really smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: You might have to blend it 3 or 4 times. I usually blend mine for a minute. Let it sit for 3 or 4 minutes then blend again until the mixture is really smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this mixture to a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a gentle simmer. Stir frequently to avoid lumps and sticking to the bottom. This heating helps to thicken the mixture a bit and also remove any water content which might make the ice cream icy when it freezes. Take off heat when evenly thickened
recipeInstructions.name: Add this mixture to a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a gentle simmer. Stir frequently to avoid lumps and sticking to the bottom. This heating helps to thicken the mixture a bit and also remove any water content which might make the ice cream icy when it freezes. Take off heat when evenly thickened

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool for 10-15 minutes then add into your loaf pan and even it out.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it cool for 10-15 minutes then add into your loaf pan and even it out.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the blueberry compote, add the blueberries and maple syrup to a saucepan. Cook over medium heat until the blueberries start to burst. Mash the berries and continue to cook to evaporate the excess moisture for 2-4 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the blueberry compote, add the blueberries and maple syrup to a saucepan. Cook over medium heat until the blueberries start to burst. Mash the berries and continue to cook to evaporate the excess moisture for 2-4 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix cornstarch in the lime juice and water and add to this blueberry mixture and continue to cook for another minute to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix cornstarch in the lime juice and water and add to this blueberry mixture and continue to cook for another minute to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Let this compote cool for 10 minutes then add to the ice cream layer in the loaf pan and swirl it in.
recipeInstructions.name: Let this compote cool for 10 minutes then add to the ice cream layer in the loaf pan and swirl it in.

recipeInstructions.text: Freeze the loaf pan for a few hours until the ice cream layer is completely frozen.
recipeInstructions.name: Freeze the loaf pan for a few hours until the ice cream layer is completely frozen.

recipeInstructions.text: Then use the remaining cookie dough mixture and press on top of the frozen ice cream. Freeze again and once completely frozen, you can slice the ice cream sandwiches.
recipeInstructions.name: Then use the remaining cookie dough mixture and press on top of the frozen ice cream. Freeze again and once completely frozen, you can slice the ice cream sandwiches.

recipeInstructions.text: The ice cream sandwiches will feel a bit hard straight from  the freezer. Let them sit at room temperature for 10 minutes and then serve.
recipeInstructions.name: The ice cream sandwiches will feel a bit hard straight from  the freezer. Let them sit at room temperature for 10 minutes and then serve.

keywords: vegan ice cream recipe, Vegan ice cream sandwiches
